title: puNNiya vazhi iduvE
sahitya:
puNNiya vazhi iduvE vIN pozhudu pOkkAmal vAzhvaip-pazhudu sheyyAmal kAkkum


anupallavi

  eNNattai urudiyAi iraivaniDamE nATTi iyalbAi irundapaDi innuyirai ATTum


caraNam    kolai pulaigaTk-kAmam kOpa tApangaL inrik-koDumaiyinrip-pirarai aDimai sheidalum inri
ulaginuk-kudaviyAi uzhaittadai InduNDu un mana sAkSikkE uNmaiyAi naDandiTTAl
